preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 152.1 g of Bismuth Oxide and place it in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 2. Add 74.3 g of Neodymium Oxide to the container. 
 3. Finally, add 11.0 g of Praseodymium Oxide. 
 4. Use a mechanical stirrer or mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powder for at least 10 minutes until homogeneous.
